verses.verse: Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery.<s%>
"You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me.

"You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourself an <S%H6459>idol,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of <S%H834>what<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> or on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath<s%> or in the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H7812>worship<s%> them or <S%H5647>serve<s%> them; for I, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the fathers on the <S%H1>children,<s%> on the <S%H1121>third<s%> and the <S%H8029>fourth<s%> generations of those who <S%H7256>hate<s%> Me,
but <S%H6213>showing<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to <S%H505>thousands,<s%> to those who <S%H157>love<s%> Me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H5352>leave<s%> him <S%H5352>unpunished<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5375>takes<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6942>keep<s%> it <S%H6942>holy.<s%>
<S%H8337>"Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H5647>labor<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4399>work,<s%>

but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> [in it] you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> you or your <S%H1121>son<s%> or your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> your <S%H5650>male<s%> or your <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H519><s%> or your <S%H929>cattle<s%> or your <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> stays with you.

"For in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in them, and <S%H5117>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H6942>made<s%> it <S%H6942>holy.<s%>

<S%H3513>"Honor<s%> your father and your <S%H1>mother,<s%> that your <S%H517>days<s%> may be <S%H3117>prolonged<s%> in the <S%H748>land<s%> <S%H127>which<s%> the <S%H834>Lord<s%> your <S%H3068>God<s%> <S%H430>gives<s%> you.
"You shall not <S%H7523>murder.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H1589>steal.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> you shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> your neighbor's <S%H802>wife<s%> or his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> or his <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H519>servant<s%> or his <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H2543>donkey<s%> or <S%H3605>anything<s%> that belongs to your neighbor."

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>perceived<s%> the <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and the <S%H3940>lightning<s%> <S%H3940>flashes<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6226>smoking;<s%> and when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it,] they <S%H5128>trembled<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at a <S%H7350>distance.<s%>

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to us <S%H859>yourself<s%> and we will <S%H8085>listen;<s%> but let not <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to us, <S%H6435>lest<s%> we <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Do not be <S%H3372>afraid;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H5668>order<s%> to <S%H5254>test<s%> you, and in <S%H5668>order<s%> that the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of Him may <S%H1961>remain<s%> <S%H6440><s%> with you, so that you may not <S%H2398>sin.<s%>"

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at a <S%H7350>distance,<s%> while <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5066>approached<s%> the <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>cloud<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> [was.]

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'You <S%H9043>yourselves<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> that I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

'You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> [other <S%H430>gods<s%>] <S%H854>besides<s%> Me; <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> or gods of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> for <S%H9043>yourselves.<s%>

'You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H127>earth<s%> for Me, and you shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> on it your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and your <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> your <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and your <S%H1241>oxen;<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> I cause My <S%H8034>name<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> I will <S%H935>come<s%> to you and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you.

'And <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> for Me, you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> it of <S%H1496>cut<s%> <S%H1496>stones,<s%> for if you <S%H5130>wield<s%> your <S%H2719>tool<s%> on it, you will <S%H2490>profane<s%> it.
'And you shall not <S%H5927>go<s%> up by <S%H4609>steps<s%> to My <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> may not be <S%H1540>exposed<s%> on it.'
